description: This Java source file defines a WebMvc configuration class within a Spring Boot application. It registers a custom interceptor for specific API documentation endpoints.

classes.name: WebMvcConfig
classes.description: A configuration class implementing WebMvcConfigurer to add custom interceptors for API documentation endpoints.

methods.name: addInterceptors
methods.description: Overrides method to register the ApiDocsLoggingInterceptor for specific URL patterns related to API docs.
